## Background
Loading in the data
 
```{r}
happy = readRDS("HAPPY.rds")
```

COnverting all the n ame to lowercase

```{r}
names(happy) = tolower(names(happy))
```

## Part one (cleaning)

**Data cleaning: the values “IAP”, “DK” and “NA” all encode missing values. Replace all of these instances by the value NA.**

```{r}
happy[happy == 'IAP'] = "NA"
happy[happy == 'DK'] = "NA"
```
